jobs.description:
Are you interested in shaping the future of movies and television in India? Prime Video is one of the leading digital video services, and we're just getting started changing the way millions of people enjoy content around the world. Available in more than 240 countries and territories, Prime Video offers customers the broadest selection of any on-demand video service.

Amazon MGM Studios is the movies and television development and production arm of Amazon. In service of Amazon's Prime Video customers globally, it is our role to produce and acquire content, including popular Originals such as The Lord of the Rings: The Rings of Power, The Boys, Fallout, Mirzapur, The Family Man, Four More Shots Please!, and Farzi.

Within Amazon MGM Studios, the International Original Strategy team is seeking a highly analytical and strategic thinker to join as a Sr. Strategy Manager in Mumbai, India. This role will focus on content strategy for Indian Original series and movies on Prime Video, including the facilitation of greenlights. The Sr. Strategy Manager will work closely with senior leaders across creative development, production, business affairs, finance, programming, and marketing, and will have a high degree of visibility within the organization. We are seeking a candidate who has a strong understanding of the movie and television business, proven analytical skills, and an ability to clearly communicate findings to senior management. The ideal candidate enjoys solving complex problems, works effectively with cross-functional teams, and thrives in a fast-paced environment that is constantly evolving.


Key job responsibilities
- Evaluate Indian Original projects being considered for greenlight
- Assess the financial and strategic considerations of various movie and television opportunities, and release models
- Analyze Prime Video viewership data to surface insights and inform senior leadership decisions
- Author content strategy documents providing recommendations on slate planning, quarterly business reviews, content investments, new business models, and 'think big' opportunities
- Serve as a knowledge center for Indian Original local and global performance, forecasting methodologies, and performance reporting

jobs.description:
アマゾンジャパンの製品コンプライアンスチームは、製品安全・コンプライアンスマネージャーを募集しています。

製品安全・コンプライアンスマネージャーは、ガイドラインの策定と実施、Amazonで販売される製品が日本の法規制に準じた安全なものであることを担保する重要な役割を持っています。また、アマゾンオペレーションズ、ビジネスチーム、法務、カスタマーサービス、技術部門、そして国内の製品安全を推進する様々な社内部門と直接協力します。内部だけでなく、専門的な検査機関などの外部機関とも積極的に協力し、一部のリスクの高い製品の調査報告やテスト結果をチェックして、安全な事業拡大をサポートします。製品安全・コンプライアンスマネージャーは、アマゾンジャパンのすべての製品が日本国内の法律とポリシーを満たしていることを保証し、安全と遵法を確認できるプロセスを導入する必要があります。これらのプロセスを導入するためには、Amazonのポリシーと、Amazonが販売する製品に適用される法的環境を理解する必要があります。その結果、Amazonがすべての顧客に提供する製品があらゆる安全関連基準や規制に準じていることを確認し、購入者の安全を守ることを第一に努めます。

We are looking for a talented Product Safety and Compliance Manager to support our rapidly growing and evolving Retail and Operations businesses. The Product Safety and Compliance Manager is responsible for ensuring compliance with all relevant product safety regulatory guidelines in Japan.

As the Product Safety and Compliance Manager, you will collaborate with Amazon’s stakeholder teams including Fulfillment Center Operations, Selling Partner Business Legal, Customer Service, and Technology teams to enforce Product Safety policies in Japan. You will actively seek cooperation from not only internal functions but also external parties and assess risks of high-risk products and evaluate test results of the products. to support business expansion. The role must ensure all products in JP Marketplace meet Amazon's policies, ensuring safety and compliance is embedded in end-to-end processes with managing/building programs. The role is responsible for understanding Amazon policies and guidelines as well as the legal requirements that applies to the product Amazon offers for sale.

Key job responsibilities
・出品者と購入者の両方のためのアマゾンの事業に焦点を当てます。主な目標は、規制要件を確実に満たす
・電子機器や消費者製品のすべての新製品の上流規制および運用プロセスを確実にするための取り組みをリードする
・外部機関と協力し、アマゾンジャパン市場で製品の安全性を確保するためのスキームを確立する
・顧客からの苦情/顧客レビューおよびカスタマーサービスのフォローアップや社外からのリコール・自主回収等の情報に基づいて、製品安全に関する問題を調べ、解決に導く
・分類データベース、規制データベースなどの運用およびキャリアと連携する製品安全固有のプロセスを設計、実装、および維持する
・オペレーション部門と協業・リソースを活用し、プロセスの効率の最大化を図る

・Focus on Amazon’s operations for both supply and customer. The primary goal is to ensure regulatory requirements are met.
・Lead efforts to review and update validation processes for all newly onboarded products that are highly regulated.
・Collaborate with external authorities and carry out a scheme to ensure product safety at JP Amazon market place.
・Drive solutions of Product Safety issues raised by customer complaints/customer review comments, internal follow-up actions, and product recall requests from external parties.
・Design, implement, and maintain Product Safety processes that interface with Fulfillment Operation teams and carriers and use classification and restriction databases.
・Help optimize Fulfillment Center processes to enhance competitive advantages and customer experience. Leverage resources available and work effectively across functions Amazon business grows.


About the team
製品安全・コンプライアンスチームでは、Amazonの日本にて販売するすべての商品が消費者にとって安全であり、安全関連法令に適合しており、また消費者の期待を満たすものであることを確実にするための施策を実施しています。この施策運用とAmazonのビジネスの発展のためには、製品やリスクの分析、テクニカルな施策を導入するための技術的な専門知識を有することが必要です。私たちの製品安全・コンプライアンスに対するビジョンはAmazonのミッションである広範囲かつ商品セレクションをサポートするものでありつつ、お客様を潜在的な危険や不適合商品から守ることにあります。私たちは、コンプライアンスを実現するために、自発的に基準を設計、発展、実装すると同時に、事業部門、オペレーション部門、また物流部門と協業しています。このように本ポジションでは、急成長を続ける企業において勤務する刺激的な機会となっています。

The Product Safety & Compliance team in Japan works to ensure that all products offered in Japan are safe for our customers, compliant with all product safety legal requirements, and meet consumer expectations. It does that by bringing product/risk science and technical expertise together with technology solutions to serve the Amazon business. Our vision for Product Safety & Compliance is to support Amazon’s mission of offering the widest selection of products available, while protecting customers from potential unsafe & non-compliant products. We are looking for a dynamic, organized self-starter to set standards, develop and implement assessment programs and partner with retail, operations and transportation teams to achieve compliance. This is an exciting opportunity to work in a highly visible space and be part of a vibrant and fast-growing company!

jobs.description:
AWS Global Services includes experts from across AWS who help our customers design, build, operate, and secure their cloud environments. Customers innovate with AWS Professional Services, upskill with AWS Training and Certification, optimize with AWS Support and Managed Services, and meet objectives with AWS Security Assurance Services. Our expertise and emerging technologies include AWS Partners, AWS Sovereign Cloud, AWS International Product, and the Generative AI Innovation Center. You’ll join a diverse team of technical experts in dozens of countries who help customers achieve more with the AWS cloud.

Are you interested in helping build the next generation of digital products with the largest and most innovative companies in Australia and New Zealand? Come join Amazon Web Services (AWS) Professional Services as a Software Engineer specializing in software engineering and application development. AWS Professional Services helps millions of businesses in 150+ countries transform their operations and applications using the power of AWS. This is an exciting opportunity to work across diverse technologies with the autonomy to design innovative solutions that directly impact customers. At AWS, you're not just an engineer, you're a curious generalist empowered to learn, grow, and make a meaningful difference in how technology can solve complex business problems.

We are seeking a hands-on Delivery Consultant with deep software engineering or cloud architecture expertise to deliver complex technical consulting engagements within AWS Professional Services. The ideal candidate will combine strong technical depth with proven product engineering capabilities, possessing both the software development background to work with complex architectures and code, and the curiosity to invent on behalf of our customers and leverage AWS services particularly in AI and ML. Artificial Intelligence is reducing the historical “IT constraint” on businesses. Imagine bold possibilities and work with our clients and partners to find innovative new ways to satisfy business needs through Data & AI services . You'll work directly with customers to deliver innovative AWS solutions, leveraging your technical expertise to ensure successful outcomes while maintaining the highest standards of quality and security.

Key job responsibilities
- Expertise - Design and develop cloud-native solutions using AWS services, including hands-on software development, architecture design, and implementation of best practices in modern development methodologies
- Solutions - Provide solution implementations including software development, CI/CD pipelines, infrastructure as code, and DevOps practices while collaborating with customers to understand requirements and create technical solutions
- Delivery - Build and implement distributed computing solutions using AWS services, involving hands-on coding, testing, and deployment across cloud environments. This includes developing new applications, modernizing existing ones, and innovating on behalf of customers.
- Technical Leadership - Guide customer and partner teams in software engineering practices, code reviews, architectural decisions, and implementation of AWS services while ensuring solution quality and security best practices
- Innovation - Develop innovative solutions using AWS AI/ML services, including building AI-enabled applications, implementing Agent architectures, and creating reusable components that demonstrate innovative use of AWS services

A day in the life
AWS Professional Services includes experts from across AWS who help our customers design, build, operate, and secure their cloud environments. Customers innovate with AWS Professional Services, upskill with AWS Training and Certification, optimize with AWS Support and Managed Services, and meet objectives with AWS Security Assurance Services. Our expertise and emerging technologies include AWS Partners, AWS Sovereign Cloud, AWS International Product, and the Generative AI Innovation Center. You’ll join a diverse team of technical experts in dozens of countries who help customers achieve more with the AWS cloud.

About the team
AWS values diverse experiences. Even if you do not meet all of the preferred qualifications and skills listed in the job description, we encourage candidates to apply. If your career is just starting, hasn’t followed a traditional path, or includes alternative experiences, don’t let it stop you from applying.

Why AWS?

Amazon Web Services (AWS) is the world’s most comprehensive and broadly adopted cloud platform. We pioneered cloud computing and never stopped innovating — that’s why customers from the most successful startups to Global 500 companies trust our robust suite of products and services to power their businesses.


Inclusive Team Culture

Here at AWS, it’s in our nature to learn and be curious. Our employee-led affinity groups foster a culture of inclusion that empower us to be proud of our differences. Ongoing events and learning experiences, including our Conversations on Race and Ethnicity (CORE) and AmazeCon (diversity) conferences, inspire us to never stop embracing our uniqueness.


Mentorship & Career Growth

We’re continuously raising our performance bar as we strive to become Earth’s Best Employer. That’s why you’ll find endless knowledge-sharing, mentorship and other career-advancing resources here to help you develop into a better-rounded professional.


Work/Life Balance

We value work-life harmony. Achieving success at work should never come at the expense of sacrifices at home, which is why we strive for flexibility as part of our working culture. When we feel supported in the workplace and at home, there’s nothing we can’t achieve in the cloud.

jobs.description:
AWS Infrastructure Services owns the design, planning, delivery, and operation of all AWS global infrastructure. In other words, we’re the people who keep the cloud running. We support all AWS data centers and all of the servers, storage, networking, power, and cooling equipment that ensure our customers have continual access to the innovation they rely on. We work on the most challenging problems, with thousands of variables impacting the supply chain — and we’re looking for talented people who want to help.

You’ll join a diverse team of software, hardware, and network engineers, supply chain specialists, security experts, operations managers, and other vital roles. You’ll collaborate with people across AWS to help us deliver the highest standards for safety and security while providing seemingly infinite capacity at the lowest possible cost for our customers. And you’ll experience an inclusive culture that welcomes bold ideas and empowers you to own them to completion.


Key job responsibilities
The responsibilities of the ACx Commissioning Engineer (CxE) include, but are not limited to, oversight and coordination of multi-discipline division of work related to pre-commissioning and commissioning of Amazon critical infrastructure construction and special projects.
• The CxE is responsible for supporting and supervising vendors, contractors and other teams involved in the construction and commissioning of various systems including medium and low voltage power systems, Generators, UPS, HVAC, Chilled Water Systems, Fuel Transfer Systems, BMS and EPMS systems.
• They provides multi-discipline input into the scheduling, designing and planning of projects. In addition, the CxE will be required to review all multi-discipline integrated systems testing and commissioning documents to ensure they are compliant with the basis of design, specifications and standards of the project.
• It is the CxE's responsibility to ensure that all commissioning procedures follow the appropriate safety practices, policies and procedures. He or she enthusiastically participates in all project and company safety programs.
• The CxE must also audit commissioning activities continuously to ensure compliance with environmental, quality, and safety requirements.
• The CxE proactively informs the ACx Regional Manager and along with the ACx team to ensure that the applicable test documents are created in accordance with all commissioning requirements so that this is aligned with the global standards and practices.
• Following the AWS project reporting format, the CxE is responsible for weekly reporting of commissioning progress and metrics for assigned project.
• You will work with deadlines across multiple projects simultaneously, while maintaining project budgets according to financial metrics
• Willingness to travel domestic and internationally for up to 50% of the time

jobs.description:
このポジションの勤務地は、埼玉県にある狭山日高FC（フルフィルメントセンター）になります。

Amazonの入荷・出荷のプロセスを行うフルフィルメントセンター（FC）には、世界トップクラスの物流設備が導入されています。FC内に張り巡らされたコンベアで商品を運搬し、棚入れ、梱包、仕分けといったあらゆるプロセスを自動化・効率化のために機械によって行っております。

JP-RME(Reliability and Maintenance Engineering)部門は、日々物流設備の保全と保守、改善を行い、お客様に満足いただけるように努めております。
今回JP-RMEで募集する職種はFCに設置されている入出荷オペレーションに関わる設備・装置を安全に取り扱い、安定稼働のための物流設備の軽微なエラー対応。および保全作業や設備の安全性や生産性を向上させるための改善をサポートいただく「物流設備メンテナンスサポート」というポジションになります。このポジションでは設備保全経験が無い方でも機械/電気/制御の知識を幅広く身に付けていくことができます。

【取り扱う設備の一例（FCによって異なる）】
■Amazon Robotics（商品棚を持ち上げて移動させるロボット）

jobs.description:
Join a talented team of software engineers and technical leaders dedicated to reaching the next billion customers. This role offers the opportunity to work on high-impact, complex challenges as we scale our systems to support new and rapidly growing India and emerging marketplaces. As a software engineer on the team, you will be responsible for the technical design and implementation of solutions that enable our Direct Fulfillment (DF) model. DF allows vendors to ship products directly to customers on behalf of Amazon. This requires building systems that can reliably work end-to-end for emerging and global marketplaces and enable seamless customer experiences. If you're excited to grow your skills while helping us scale the world's most customer-centric retail technology, we'd love to hear from you!





Key job responsibilities
You will be a technical leader to drive the
- Designing and developing highly reliable, scalable, and distributed systems.
- Delivering quality features on-time and execution against project plans and delivery commitments.
- Working with team members to manage the day-to-day development activities, participate in designs, design review, code review, implementation, and operational excellence.
- Engaging and working with customers and dependencies to ensure the quality delivery.
- Mentoring other engineers
- Maintaining current technical knowledge to support rapidly changing technology, always on a look out for new technologies and work with the team in bringing in new technologies.
- Launch products to India as well as world-wide marketplaces

About the team
Direct Fulfillment (DF), known in the industry as "dropship," is a fulfillment model that allows vendors to ship orders directly to the Customer. The offer is branded as 'Ships and Sold by Amazon' and the customer service experience is the same as items sold from Amazon Fulfillment centers, such that the customer does not know the difference. DF was launched in India (IN) on Oct 2018. Our vision: “provide customers with widest possible retail selection while maintaining a superior experience for vendors and cost structure for Amazon”.

Our Financial Operations team is now looking for a proactive, customer and detail oriented Finance Analyst whose main responsibility will be to manage and resolve receivables and payment related queries received from our business customers.

As part of our commitment to your development, you will also gain exposure in cross-functional and process improvement projects, but you can expect your responsibilities to include to:

• Managing customer liabilities to Amazon - credit collection operations
• Reviewing and monitoring AR Aging Reports and collections targets
• Responding to customer invoicing inquiries, researching unpaid or disputed amounts and working directly with the customer to resolve their issues and correct invoicing errors
• Reconcile Amazon’s open receivables with customers to ensure quick and timely AR collection.
• Work effectively with all relevant stakeholders to ensure we are serving our customers in the most effective manner, especially for customers facing cash flow or internal issues
• Earn the trust of external and internal stakeholders/customers, build long-lasting relationships that reinforce Amazon’s customer centricity and continually look at ways to improve customer experience and customer satisfaction
• Work with Amazon customers to drive process improvements and resolve escalations and discrepancies
• Diagnose, improve and fix any issues with our current collections processes

Base pay for this position starts from EUR 1,785.00 gross per month and salary depends on the skills and requirements, there will be further pay components such as a sign on bonus and the eligibility to participate in a restricted stock unit scheme operated independently by Amazon.com Inc. in USA. Company benefits apply subject to further terms, including annual membership in medical clinic, life insurance, retirement pension, meal voucher card, career development

jobs.description:
Position Overview
The Amazon B2B Payment & Lending team provides payment services including various payment methods to customers using Amazon Business. This position, as a Senior Program Manager, is responsible for defining and executing the Go-to-Market strategy for payment method centered on Pay By Invoice (PBI), while driving continuous improvement of customer experience.
You will identify improvement opportunities from customer feedback and lead initiatives from strategy to execution in collaboration with various stakeholders both domestically and internationally (Product, Credit, Marketing, Sales, Customer Service, Financial Operations, etc.). Additionally, you will lead feature launches by working with product teams to define requirements needed for Australian customers and coordinating with various internal departments.

Why This Position
Amazon Business is a rapidly growing business, and we are looking for someone who can take initiative even in this highly dynamic environment. This position offers extensive exposure to product management processes and opportunities to collaborate with engineers and product managers, making it an excellent career path toward becoming a Product Manager or moving into General Management positions.
You will have opportunities to work closely with stakeholders overseas (US, EU, JP, etc.) as well as various departments in Australia, and lead global projects. This is a position where you can demonstrate your ability to influence stakeholders, make data-driven decisions, and deliver projects and resolve issues.

Key job responsibilities
Go-to-Market Strategy
• Define the Go-to-Market strategy and roadmap for business customers in Australia, and drive customer adoption of payment services centered on our flagship product “Pay By Invoice”
• Work with partner teams to influence their roadmap and priorities to deliver against the GTM strategy for Voice of Customer (VoC) Program
• Be the advocate for our customers and lead team to set up VoC and research mechanism/program to enable us to identify opportunities to improve customer experience, drive engagement and increase GTM effectiveness
• Collect customer feedback, identify areas requiring service improvements, and propose and execute improvement initiatives

Product Improvement and Launch Management
• Define feature improvement roadmap. Manage the backlog of feature requests and determine prioritization and trade-offs to achieve alignment across various departments
• Lead feature launches by working with product owners to confirm requirements needed and leading projects together with relevant stakeholders
• Identify root causes of service issues and work with Product Managers and Engineers to resolve them. Build new processes to prevent similar issues

Metrics Management and Reporting
• Own key adoption metrics, inclusive of reporting, driving progress against goals and representing the business in regular business reviews
• Regularly report project / program progress to leadership


About the team
The Amazon B2B Payments and Lending team revolutionizes financial services for businesses of all sizes anywhere in the world, enabling them to delight their customers and make a positive impact to the communities they serve. We never stop innovating to earn their trust by leveraging our scale, insights, and technology, and raise the bar with simple, secure, and seamless solutions.
